channel.title: Looking for hoster
channel.description:
we are looking for a hoster who would able to host a server for 17-24hours a day we are a team that consist of: 1.a professional server developer and coder that i started coding from almost blank server and the server now has huge amounts of new updates (most of them not from tutorials) 2. a website developer who develops vBulletin forums the server is ready for hosting and advertising we are going to buy a vps and a web host with domain as soon as we got enough money
i added a huge amount of things that players would donate for it such as
[ul][*]double exp ring [*]new torva model [*]some new colored whips [*]3 ranks of donators [/ul]
i also added 99% cursors added new home area and funpk area
also added trivia bot
also added PK MASTER
and alot more and i also have a good knowledge of photoshop a have made some good interfaces.
we have our website and its ready and finished. we will start running the server again as soon as we find a hoster
the hoster will her co-owner rank ingame and owner rank in the forums
if you are able and interested of hosting my skype name is "mr-m7md1". my msn is "mohamad_1995@live.com".
or you can visit the forums [url=http://decox.cu.cc/]http://decox.cu.cc/[/url] and register and send a privet message to "ezio" the developer(that's would be me) we are in a harry because we need to host the server so we dont loos our community. we hope to fine a hoster soon.
PS.i didnt uploaded any pictures for the server if you want to ask something replay back but if you are interested of hosting ill show you the server buy the hamachi.

item.title: Looking for hoster
item.dc:creator: @abd1 abd1
item.description:
@abd1 wrote:

we are looking for a hoster who would able to host a server for 17-24hours a day
we are a team that consist of:
1.a professional server developer and coder that i started coding from almost blank server and the server now has huge amounts of new updates (most of them not from tutorials)
2. a website developer who develops vBulletin forums
the server is ready for hosting and advertising

if you are able and interested of hosting
my skype name is “mr-m7md1”.

or you can visit the forums http://decox.cu.cc/ and register and send a privet message to “ezio” the developer(that’s would be me)
we are in a harry because we need to host the server so we dont loos our community.

PS.i didnt uploaded any pictures for the server
if you want to ask something replay back but if you are interested of hosting ill show you the server buy the hamachi.
